analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#111-126) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#115-116)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#116-117)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#117-118)

SaleClockAuction.orderOnSaleAuction (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#492-504) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(nonFungibleContract)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.ClockAuction (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#314-326):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateContract.implementsERC721()) (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#321-323)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nonFungibleContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#324-325)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#336-363):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(msg.sender,_tokenId)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#348-350)
	- _escrow(msg.sender,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#350-353)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in SaleClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#449-475):

	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#473-474)

Reentrancy in SaleClockAuction.order (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#476-492):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(buyer,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/10/0x836a5f830d695b4f9975ee87b0b0be68c44ff585.sol#488)
